ホテルで抱きしめて 快感セレブ編
ホテルで抱きしめて 悶絶セレブ編
ホテルで抱きしめて 柔肌満喫編
ホテルで抱きしめて 桃色吐息編
ホテルで抱きしめて 極上完結編
ホテルで抱きしめて 満開乙女編
ホテルで抱きしめて 癒らし美女編

description.en:
From Tadanohito:  
  
This series is centered around a well-endowed hotel worker and the encounters he has with various guests and employees. Each story could probably be taken separately, so it's not exactly a serial, where each chapter builds on the previous. Because of this variety, there are various types of stories and sex, generally consensual, and involving all kinds of fetishes.  
  
In the Hotel de Dakishimete series:  
  
V.1 - Funsen Onnazakarihen  
V.2 - Monzetsu Celebhen  
V.3 - Mankai Otomehen  
V.4 - Yawahada Mankitsuhen  
V.5 - Momoiro Toikihen  
V.6 - Iyarashi Bijohen  
V.7 - Uruwashi Shukujohen  
V.8 - Kaikan Celeb-Hen  
V.9 - Chouzetsu Gohoushihen  
V.10 - Gokujou Kanketsuhen
